headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Devon Energy (DVN) Cutting Debt and Capital Spending Amid Higher Returns
summary: Goldman Sachs reiterated its "Buy" rating on Devon Energy following the company’s Q3 2025 results, which included a US$485 million reduction in net debt and US$401 million in shareholder returns through dividends and share repurchases. Notably, Devon Energy’s initial 2026 guidance calls for lower capital expenditures and slightly higher production, reflecting prudent capital management and operational optimization. Next, we’ll explore how Devon’s focus on reducing capital expenditures shapes...
